K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:139b-1: a'arya bha dra b'a la shreshn'i pa ri pritstsh'a n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-0: 'phags pa tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus @140a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-1: pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-5: sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa bya ba byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-7: dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-8: de'i tshe dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad na lus snyom pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-9: gnyid kyis gnas pas lus nyon mongs pa med cing lus snyoms pa med par gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-10: yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs me tog padma'i tshal rgyas pa lta bur snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-11: de nas dge slong de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi mdangs padma'i tshal rgyas pa lta bur snang bar gyur pa las na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-13: bcom ldan 'das 'di chos kyi tshul ji lta bu zhig ston par dgongs shig gu snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-14: de nas de'i tshe tshong dpon bzang skyong zhes bya ba 'khor tshong pa drug khri dang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140a-15: de nas bzang skyong shin tu gzhon sha can la lus kyi mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-0: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa rab tu zhi ba dang dul ba'i yon tan gyi gter du gyur pa gser gyi shing ljon pa ltar gzi brjid 'bar @140b bar mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-1: de nas bzang skyong dad pa skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-2: mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid kyis 'di snyam du sems te; kye ma thams cad mkhyen pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes 'jig rten du snyan pa dag grags pa 'di ni mi rdzun no snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-3: de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta ba gtad de 'dug par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bzang skyong la gzigs nas sku las 'od zer phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-6: 'od zer des kyang tshong dpon bzang skyong mi 'jigs pa skyes nas; bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-7: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-9: bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-10: bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la da gdod dad pa thob pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-12: de lta lags pas phyogs 'ga' la re ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-13: chos 'tshal ba 'khor ba'i gnod pa rnams kyis yongs su nyon mongs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-14: rnam par rtog pa'i shas che ba ngo mtshar du gyur pa can bdag la bshad du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-16: bdag ni the tshom can lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-18: bdag ni som nyi can lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:140b-19: gang gis bdag rmongs par 'gyur zhing 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba ma 'tshal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-0: @141a *// ni; thams cad mkhyen pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-1: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'grub par mdzad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-2: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu 'jig rten du de'u ma byung ste byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-4: sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pas na pha ma lta bu yang lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-8: de'i phyir khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-9: ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas sems rangs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-10: de nas bzang skyong zhu bar 'dod pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-11: tshong dpon bzang skyong gzi brjid 'bar zhing gzugs bzang po phun sum tshogs pa phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-14: bzang skyong 'di'i mdog bzang zhing rgyas pas rgyal po'i dpal yang zil gyis non te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-15: lhag par mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-18: bzang skyong 'di'i bde ba'i yo byad gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-19: dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod pa gang yin pa de ni tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa ma gtogs par /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141a-20: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-0: 'dzam bu'i @141b gling na khyad par du 'phags pa rnams la yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-3: tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di'i nor du gyur pa gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-6: de'i phyir khyod kyis tshong dpon dge ba'i rtsa ba byas pa 'di'i 'byor pa dang longs spyod rgyas pa nyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-8: nor dang gser phun sum tshogs pa'i tshong pa drug khri 'di'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-9: mal khri tshon sna tshogs spel bas mdzes par byas pa smig thags can la stan nang tshangs can bting ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-10: g-yas g-yon du sngas dmar po bzhag pa drug khri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-11: bud med bgo ba dar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-16: la tshig gu'i stod kor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-18: rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snam phran can gyi gos gyon pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-19: 'dod chags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-20: lag mthil reg na snyi zhing shin tu 'jam pa rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-22: tshig 'chos shing sgeg la snyan pa'i gtam brjod pas bskyed pa'i dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-23: mchog tu dga' bas rgod par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-24: khyim thab la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshul gyis lus la bstod par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:141b-25: skyes pa gzhan la 'dod pa'i rgyud spangs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-1: pas 'dud cing bla gos bzang po bgos pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-2: gcig la gcig phrag dog gis 'thab pa dang rtse bas bzhin khro gnyer gtsigs shing 'khu bar 'gyur ba med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-3: rkang lag dang sor mo shin tu 'jam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-4: rkang lag gi tshigs kyi bar mtshams mi mngon pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-6: skra mnyam zhing bcos la g-yas su 'khyil zhing mdzes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-7: snying chags pa dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-8: shin tu snying nye ba snyan par grags pa'i rigs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-9: rus las byung bas grags pa dang legs pa bskyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-11: rigs mtho ba'i bud med rtse bar 'os pa'i khang pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-12: mal cha rgyas pa dang ldan pa drug khri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-13: btso zangs drug khri gang ba'i 'bras chan bzang po /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-14: tshod ma shin tu dri zhim pos sna tha dad par phye ba s'a lu bzang po'i chan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-15: chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-16: lha bu'i kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs dri zhim zhing yid du 'ong la dga' ba skyed par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-17: nyon ma mongs par grub cing bsod nams kyis byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-18: dri nga zhing mi gtsang ba dang lus kyi skyon du 'gyur ba med pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-19: khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-22: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142a-23: rnam par phye la sdug cing mdzes par byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-0: ras sbyangs shing rlung gis bskyod @142b pa'i bun long dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-1: me tog sil mas gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-2: bsil ba'i chus reg na bde bas khyab pas bsil bar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-4: pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-7: rdza rnga chen po las byung ba'i sgra snyan pa'i dar dir dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-8: phug ron gyi skad yid du 'ong zhing chags su rung bas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-9: me tog gi 'khri shing gis rtse mo 'khris pa la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-12: ri rab kyi phrag gi bar lta bu'i rlung skyabs dang ldan pa'i mar me 'bar ba'i gzi brjid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-13: sman gyi sgron ma dngar ba drug khri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-17: srang sdug gus mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-18: yul sna tshogs kyi skad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-21: tshong khang sna tshogs spel bas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-22: tshong pa'i tshogs stong dag gis lang long du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-24: shing ljon pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag gis 'khrigs pa; ku mu ta'i me tog rgyas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-25: dri ma med pa spel bas mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-28: shing rta'i mchog gis bun long du gyur pa drug khri yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:142b-30: grong khyer de dag gi nang na tshong dpon dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-0: ded dpon 'khod pa rnams kyang tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong de'i bsngags pa brjod cing snyan par smra bar byed @143a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-1: de; nyin gcig bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas 'dud par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-2: yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang de'i dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-3: 'byor pa dang longs spyod rgyas pa mthong na bdag nyid la mi dbul po lta bur 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-5: tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni btso zangs 'bum gyis g-yos byed pa dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-7: de'i bsnyen bkur byed pa yang bud med lnga stong yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-9: zla ba 'byor pa de la ni lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bde ba'i yo byad kyis kyang cha tsam du yang mi phod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-11: tshong dpon gzhon nu zla ba 'byor pa de la ni tshong dpon bzang skyong gi gzugs bzang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-14: bde pa'i yo byad kyis brgya'i char yang mi phod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-16: 'on kyang bzang skyong la ni lha'i shing rta lha'i nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba nam mkha' skar mas spras pa dang 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-17: lha'i gser tsher bas ngos spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-20: me shel sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-21: rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs shing nam mkha' lding gi shugs ltar 'gro ba de la zhon na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-22: rin po che'i gling du yang 'gro zhing bde ba dang ldan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143a-23: rtsed mo nyams su myong nas phyir 'ong ba'i shing rta'i mchog yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-0: de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan @143b 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-1: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-3: tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bsags lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-6: 'dir dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa dag gi rnam par smin pa ni 'di yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-8: 'das pa'i dus na 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i 'od ces bya ba byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-9: kun dga' bo; tshong dpon bzang skyong de ni de'i nyan thos gtsug phud bzang zhes bya bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-10: bslab pa'i gzhi ma nyams shing tshul khrims ma 'chal par spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-11: chos smra ba thos pa'i mdzod 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-13: des nyin gcig bzhin du sems can rnams la skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-15: gsang mtho zhing zur phyin pas chos bstan to; ;gang gis chos de thos shing kun chub par byas pa de yang phyin chad log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-17: de chos kyi sbyin pa des bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lha dang mi rnams mgu bar byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:143b-19: de'i shing rta'i gzhal med khang gang yin pa de yang bshad par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-1: cing tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-2: lus nyam chung ba zhig la dad pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms byin nas lham zung gcig kyang byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-3: de'i bsod nams rnam par smin pa das [*des?] na lha'i shing rta'i mchog mngon par grub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis kyang 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa 'byung ba des khyod lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-8: tshong dpon bzang skyong 'di ni ngas 'dul ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-12: gser phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yul rnams kyis kyang dregs par ma gyur pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-14: mkhas pa dag ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgyas pa'i khyad par dag gis dregs par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-16: tshong dpon 'di ni dge ba'i chos can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams su myong ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144a-19: tshong dpon gzhon nu bzang skyong gis bdag nyid kyi skabs phye bar rtogs nas thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das @144b la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-1: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-2: bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la sman 'dogs shing thugs brtse ba can la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-5: de'i phyir khyod kyi dri ba dang mthun pa'i dus la bab kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-7: khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-9: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-11: 'di ni sems can rnams rnam par shes pa ma 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-12: za ma tog gi nang gi rin po che mi rig pa bzhin du thams cad kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtogs na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-14: rnam par shes pa de gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-15: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-18: mi gum pa'i rkang lag dang mig nyams shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-19: 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe dbang po rnams 'gag cing khams rnams dang mi ldan par gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-20: rnam par shes pa 'di lus las ji ltar 'pho zhing mchi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-21: gzugs ni ji lta bu lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-22: rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:144b-23: lus dang ni ji ltar 'bral bar 'gyur /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:145b-0: gzugs su snang @145b bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:145b-1: khyod kyis rgyu'i bye brag dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams rtogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:145b-2: de la rgyu gang zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146a-20: lus kyi rkyen gyi reg bya ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146a-22: chos kyi skye mched kyang gzugs can ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146a-23: rab tu shes pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146a-24: de bas na spyod yul rnams kyang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-0: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs can ma yin par blta bar @146b bya'o; ;ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-2: 'dir 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe las zad pas tshe 'gag pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-3: las kyi sgrib pas zin pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di 'pho bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-5: dgra bcom pa 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de khong bar 'gag nas yongs su 'phyan pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-6: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang skye ba po shi ba'i lus yongs su btang zhing khams rnams bor nas dran pa stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-10: tshor ba rnam pa gnyis kyis zin to snyam du rab tu shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-11: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ni lus kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-12: shi nas ni yid kyi tshor ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-13: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i don ci zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-14: sa bon gyis lus kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-15: sems pas shes pa dran pa thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-16: de bas na sa bon dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-18: gzhan yang bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas shes pa de rtogs pas na de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-19: gzhan yang de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-20: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i spyod yul shes pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:146b-21: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-5: me long gi gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-8: nyi ma shar na rab rib dang mun pa med par 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-9: nyi ma med par gyur na yang mun pa 'byung bar 'gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-10: mun pa de'i gnas ther zug pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-11: ther zug pa ma yin pa yang med la; mun pa de la yang gzugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-12: tshor ba mi snang ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-13: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus skyes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-14: mun pa bzhin du lus la gnas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-15: mis kyang rnam par shes pa mi mthong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-16: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus 'di 'dzin par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-18: bud med kyi mngal na bu gnas pa la ci bdag gi lto na 'dug pa 'di khye'u 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-24: dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-25: rkang lag mnyam pa yin par mi shes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-26: lto'i mngal na gnas pa de yang kha zas ha cang tsha bas 'gul zhing rig la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147a-27: tshor bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-2: las thams cad yongs su spyad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-5: bsam pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin can lus la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa la bdag gi lus la rnam par shes pa gnas pa 'di rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig snyam du sems can rnams kyis mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-7: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-8: dngos po thams cad la chub pa yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-9: dngos po rnams kyis kyang gos pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-11: 'di na rnam par shes pa ni bsgos pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-12: dbang po drug po rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-13: dbang po drug gi spyod yul rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-15: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-17: 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa la bsgo bar bya ba yin par blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-19: shing gi 'khrul 'khor phur bu gcig gis gzugs byas pa de bya ba thams cad byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-23: bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag la 'jug na; bzang skyong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-25: 'khrul 'khor de gang gi dbang gis 'jug par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-28: bkas rmas pa de'i rgyus ni bdag gis ma 'tshal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:147b-31: 'khrul 'khor de ni las kyi dbang gis 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-0: las de yang gzugs can ma yin zhing rnam par shes pa las mngon @148a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-2: de bzhin du lus kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di yang rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-3: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus sna tshogs la 'jug pa yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-5: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus kyi khams la brten pa'i phyir mi zad pa yang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-6: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni sngon gyi lus kyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i phyir blo phun sum tshogs pa yang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-7: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-9: nyi ma'i 'od zer ni dri nga ba dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-12: 'on kyang de dag la dri des gos par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-13: nyi ma yang dri nga ba bor te yang mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-14: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang phyi sa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-15: snyag snyig za ba'i khyi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-16: phag gi skye gnas dag tu yang skye ba yongs su 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-17: 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams la spyod pa ngan pa de dag gis gos pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-19: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni lus yongs su btang nas dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rjes su 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-20: de yang ji lta zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-21: rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'dis lus 'dir bor nas bsod nams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148a-22: bsod nams ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-1: rlung gi khams brag gi phrag nas byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-2: shing tsam pa ka dang phrad de spos shin tu dri zhim po khyer nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-5: ro'i dri yang khyer te 'gro la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-6: bzang skyong; de las gang ches shas che ba de'i dri dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-7: ji ltar rlung gi khams de dri rnam pa gnyis khyer te 'gro yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-8: rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-9: dri de gnyis kyang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus las 'phos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-11: mi dge ba khyer nas 'pho ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-12: de ltar na de'i 'pho ba dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-14: rmi lam na mis dngos po thams cad shes kyang lus des mal na 'dug par mi shes pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-15: bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams rmi lam rmi ba bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lkog ma'i mid pa rnams nas kyang mi 'byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-16: bu ga rnams nas kyang ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-17: de ni khong bu dang gsab rnams mi 'tshol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-18: de nas bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-20: ji ltar na bya gag gi sgo nga'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-21: ngang pa'i sgo nga ma phrugs pa shun pa ma rdol par sgo nga'i nang nas bye'u phrug rnams 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-22: ji ltar na bu ga ma brtol bar rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:148b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-0: @149a *// til 'bru tsam pa ka'i me tog gis bsgos nas legs par brdungs te btsir ba las til mar byung ba ni tsam pa ka'i til mar zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-2: dper na; dri des kyang til 'bru ma brtol bzhin du dri zhim pos bsgos te 'phos te 'gro yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-3: dri des snum gyi ro myong bar yang mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-4: 'bru'i rkyen dang me tog dang phrad pas til mar dri dang 'dris pa'i dngos por 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-5: 'on kyang til gyi 'bru de la me tog gi dri de gseb nas 'gro ba ni med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-6: de'i rkyen gyis dri de 'pho zhing 'gro ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang me tog gi dri bzhin du sgo nga'i shun pa ma brtol bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-7: de'i 'pho ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-8: gzhan yang de'i 'pho ba ni nyi ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-10: bsreg bya dang 'dra bar yang blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-11: gzhan yang sa bon 'pho ba dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-12: sa phyogs gang du sa bon btab na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-16: rlung gi khams gcig pa kho na las sa bon de sa la brten cing sdong bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149a-22: smin pa'i ro tha dad par 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams chos kyi khams gcig pu 'di las srid par skye ba thams cad du lus sngo sangs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-3: rang bzhin gyis mnyen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-5: gzhan yang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di lus yongs su btang nas sa bon du 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-6: bdag nyid rkang lag dang ldan par shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-7: 'on kyang de la yan lag dang nying lag ni med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-8: de yang sa'i khams yongs su btang nas chos kyi khams yongs su 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-9: chos kyi khams de yang dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-10: dran pa de yang spyod yul gyi stobs dang ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-11: chos kyi khams dran pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i len pa'i rgyu ni rnam par shes pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-12: rnam par shes pa ma gtogs par yang chos kyi khams mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-13: chos kyi khams ma gtogs par yang rnam par shes pa'i khams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-14: rlung gi khams ni rnam par shes pa de'i rjes su 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-15: gzhan yang lha'i khams 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-19: gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa rnams kyang rjes su 'jug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-20: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-22: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de gzugs can lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-26: phyi rol gyi gzugs yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-27: de la nang gi gzugs gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:149b-28: zin pa'i mig gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-1: shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-2: rna ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-3: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-4: sna gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-5: sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-6: lce gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-7: lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so; ;lus gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-8: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa de ni nang gi gzugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-12: mi dmus long zhig nub mo gnyid kyi dbang du gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-13: lha'i gzugs rkang lag mnyam shing mchog tu yid du 'ong bdag mthong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-14: des de dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-15: gnyid log pa las sad pa dang gzugs de dag ma mthong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-18: mdang mtshan mo bdag gi rmi lam du bud med kyi gzugs mchog tu yid du 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-19: skyed mos tshal mi stong gis gang ba mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-20: der bdag gis mi lus shin tu gzhon sha can lag pa glang po che mchog gi sna ltar rid ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-21: thal gong yangs shing rgyas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-22: brang yangs shing mkhregs pa dag mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-24: mi de dag gi lus kyi rgyan mdzes pa gang yin pa de dag bzlas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150a-25: de nas dmus long des mi de dag nyid kyi gzugs rnams ma mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-1: mi dmus long des rmi lam du gzugs rnams ji ltar mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-4: de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-7: de bas na nang gi mig shes pa dang ldan pas rmi lam du gzugs rnams mthong gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-8: sha'i mig gis ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-9: ji ltar mi gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du yud tsam zhig dran par 'byung ba bzhin du shi ba'i dran pa yang de dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-10: nang gi gzugs de yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-12: gzhan yang mi shi ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de sa bon gyi khams bzhin du 'pho zhing 'gro ba ngas bshad par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-14: sa bon gyi khams sa gzhi la btab na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-15: khams bzhi po dag sdud par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang dran pa rab tu 'dzin cing tshor ba yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-17: mi dge ba yang rjes su bzung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-18: lus yongs su btang ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-20: ji ltar na rnam par shes pa de dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-23: nor bu rin po che padma r'a ga ni 'od nag po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-25: 'od kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du nor bu rin po che de la 'byung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:150b-26: de'i rang bzhin nyid nor bu rin po che de la snang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-0: gnas gang dang gang du 'phos pa de dang der kha dog dag snang ba de bzhin du rnam par @151a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-1: shes pa 'di dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su bzung nas 'pho zhing 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-2: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-3: bcom ldan 'das; ji ltar na lus 'di la rnam par shes pa rtogs par 'gyur ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-6: rnam par shes pa 'di bsags pa'am spungs par yang mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-8: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di skye zhing 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-11: sa bon las ni myu gu 'byung mod kyi sa bon rul pa las myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-12: sa bon nyams pa las kyang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-16: myu gu de'i sa bon sdong bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-19: sa bon ni shing gi rtse mo na yang mi gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-20: de bzhin du lus 'di la rnam par shes pa gang na yang mi gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-21: mig mig la yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-22: rna ba la yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-23: sna'i dbang po la gnas pa yang ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-24: sa bon gyis myu gu skye ba gang yin pa de ni sems pa chung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-25: mngal du skye ba de ni tshor ba chung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-27: myu gu 'byung zhing dus tshigs dang ldan pa na me tog rnams 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151a-28: me tog grub na 'bras bu 'grub pa yod pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-0: lus grub @151b ba na yan lag dang nying lag gang la yang rnam par shes pa mi gnas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-1: rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-3: shing yongs su smin pa las sa bon 'byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-4: yongs su ma smin pa las ma yin pa de bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lus las rnam par shes pa 'di snang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-5: tshor ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-7: dran pas yongs su bzung ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-8: dge ba la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-9: mi dge ba la mi dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-10: rlung gi khams kyis yongs su zin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-11: shes pas mngon par brlan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-12: rkyen la mngon du phyogs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni pha ma phrad pa na skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-14: me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu phyis pa la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-15: bzhin med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-16: me long med par yang gzugs brnyan mi 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-17: ji ltar bzhin dang me long phrad pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-18: gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs can ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-19: de la tshor ba dang rab tu shes pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-20: lus gang dang gang du bskyod pa de dang de nyid du gzugs brnyan 'pho zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-21: ji lta bur lus smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-25: brkyang bar byed pa de bzhin du bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan yang 'gyur bar snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:151b-28: gang gi dbang gis gzugs brnyan de dmigs par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-1: mi'i dbang po'i gzugs brnyan gda' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-2: de yang me long gi rkyen gyis bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gda' la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-3: bzhin gyi mdog ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-4: dbang po ma tshang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-5: dbang po tshang ba de nyid kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-7: ji ltar lus kyi dbang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-8: me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen gyis gzugs brnyan 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-9: rnam par shes pa'i dbang gis lus 'di tshor ba myong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-12: yid la byed pa 'grub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-13: de la me long gang yin pa de ni pha ma phrad pa lta bur blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-14: ji ltar lus mi snang na gzugs brnyan mi snang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-16: me long gi dkyil 'khor la gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin yod pa spangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-17: yang chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'byung bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su btang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-18: lus kyi rang bzhin 'phangs nas phung po gzhan thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-20: sa bon gyi khams chung ngu zin kyang shing n+ya gro ta dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-21: au dum wa ra la sogs pa'i shing gi phung po chen po bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-22: yang shing de yongs su btang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-23: shing gzhan 'dzin la sa bon gyi khams yongs su btang ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-24: dus bzlog par 'gyur bas shing de'i khams kyi bcud med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152a-25: khams kyi bcud rnams med par gyur pas shing de yongs su rnyings shing yongs su skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-0: rnam par shes pa'i khams phra zhing mi gsal ba 'dis kyang lus rnams @152b bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-2: lus gzhan dag sgrub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-8: mon sran sde'u la sogs pa'i sa bon cung zad gang na yod pa der cung zad sems pa lta bur gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-9: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang sems can gyi ris gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der sems pa yongs su bzung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-12: bsod nams ma yin pa rjes su bzung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-13: 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu 'pho'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-15: bung ba ro la sred pas yun ring du me tog la gnas te; longs spyod nas me tog yongs su btang ste me tog gzhan du 'pho la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-16: bung ba de yang me tog dri mi zhim pa longs spyad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-17: dri zhim par 'gro bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-18: me tog gang dang gang la 'byar ba de dang de la chags shing ro yang myong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i lus blangs te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu longs spyad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-19: phyir yang sems can dmyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-21: yi dvags kyi nang du lus blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-22: des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myong nas yang phung po lnga po gzhan dag len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-23: de la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-25: gur gum gyi sa bon nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:152b-26: leb rgan rtsi'i sa bon rnams rang bzhin gyis dkar la de dag gi khong na myu gu yang mi snang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-0: kha dog kyang mi snang yang sa bon @153a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-1: de sa'i khams la btab na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-2: chu'i khams kyis yongs su brlan nas myu gu mngon par 'grub bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-3: myu gu mngon par grub nas me tog dmar po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-6: 'on kyang kha dog de yang sa bon gyi khong na mi gnas la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-7: sa bon med na yang kha dog dang myu gu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-8: mi'i sha tshugs can yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-9: sha snag gu'i dbang po 'byung ba'i skye mched dang ldan pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-10: de lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-14: chos kyi skye mched rab tu shes pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-15: 'di snyam du gang bdag gis las byas pa de nyid ni bdag yin no snyam du yang shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-16: lus de yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis bsdus pa yin te; dper na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-17: dar gyi srin bu rang gi lus las skud pa'i rgyud byung bas khyim byas la de nyid de'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-18: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus bskyed nas dar gyi srin bu bzhin du bdag nyid yang lus yongs su btang nas med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-20: padma chu'i nang nas skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-21: lha'i dri dang kha dog mngon par 'grub kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-22: padma dkar po de la chu'i khams kyang mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-23: de'i nang du mi snang bar gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153a-24: gang du sa bon gnas pa der /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-0: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang du 'pho @153b zhing 'gro ba der dbang po dag gi spyod yul rnams 'pho bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-3: chos kyi khams rnams kyang der 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-5: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che gang du 'gro ba der longs spyod thams cad 'pho zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-7: nyi ma dang 'brel ba'i 'od zer rnams nyi ma gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du 'od zer rnams kyang rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-8: rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di dag gang du 'pho ba de dang de nyid du tshor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-10: chos kyi khams rnams kyang 'pho zhing 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-11: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su btang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-12: dngos po thams cad kyi phrad pa yongs su bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-14: rus pa med pa'i lus 'grub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-15: de'i lus len pa'i rgyu ni gzugs yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-16: dbang po'i dngos po rnams ni tshor bas myong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-17: dran pa ni lha'i lta bas mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-18: dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-25: ka pid ta la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams ni ro du mar 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-30: bska ba la sogs pa'i ro re res rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-31: la la ni ro tsha bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:153b-34: 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho ba der ro yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-0: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams @154a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-1: 'di gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der tshor ba 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-3: bsod nams ma yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-4: dran pa yang 'pho bar 'gyur ro; ;gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis ni lus yongs su btang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-5: bdag gis lus 'di yongs su btang ngo snyam du rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-6: de bas na 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-7: dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-8: mi dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-9: las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-10: bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-11: de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:154a-12: gzhan yang lus 'di bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te /
