K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:158b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:158b-31: ngas kyang gzugs can ma yin par thugs su chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:158b-32: 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-3: 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-5: mi la la skem byed dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-8: lha'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-11: ci mi de'i khong na 'dug pa'i skem byed dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-18: slad rol na yang gdon mi gda' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-19: gdon de dag ni gzugs ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-22: lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin tu dri zhim pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-25: me tog phreng byin pa len pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsod nams dang ldan pas kyang lus blangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-26: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-29: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-30: ji ltar lha'i gdon de lha'i me tog phreng ba byin pas rangs par 'gyur zhing mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug nyid la dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-31: lus de yang tshim par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159a-32: de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di ni bsod nams myong ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-1: srul po'i gdon mi sdug cing gzugs mi snang ba mi'i lus la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-6: gtor ma 'dod cing de yang gtor ma des dga' bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-7: mi de yang gdon gyi dbang gis dri nga zhing mi gtsang ba las byung ba'i kha zas btsog pa dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las kyis skye gnas ngan par bskyed de dbul po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-9: ljan ljin za ba dag la chags shing dga' bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-10: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin pa myong ba yang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-12: lha'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-13: rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma yin pa 'di yang bsod nams gzugs can ma yin pas yongs su bzung nas lha'i lus rnams skyed par byed do; ;dper na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-14: srul po'i gdon gzugs med pa mi la gnas shing phyi sa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-15: ljan ljin za bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:159b-16: de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro bar yang lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-1: na khyod kyis gdon gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams lta bur blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-2: gdon gyi longs spyod bzang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-3: ngan pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-4: mi dge ba lta bur lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-5: mi gang yin pa de ni lus lta bur lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-8: 'di ni len pa'i rgyu ji ltar lta bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-10: 'di ni phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-14: de skyed pa mi'i rtsol ba las kyang brten te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-15: me 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di len pa'i rgyu skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-16: bud med kyi rkyen gyis sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-19: gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-21: me tog las 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-22: 'on kyang me tog de la yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la; 'bras bur grub pa la yang me tog mi dmigs pa de bzhin du lus 'di las rnam par shes pa 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-23: 'on kyang lus de la yang rnam par shes pa mi snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-24: rnam par shes pa ldog pas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-28: mi gtsang ba rnams rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160a-30: sa bon de me tog gi kha dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-0: @160b ro 'debs pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-1: lus yongs su btang nas dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-5: yid la byed pa yang btab nas; 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-8: bud med gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis phrad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-10: bud med la shin tu dam por 'khyud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-11: nyon mongs pa 'byin par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-12: de gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa med par gyur nas yang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-13: de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-14: der nyon mongs pa phyung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-16: yang gcig la gcig 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus dang phrad pa rnyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-17: dga' ba bskyed de chags pa 'phel bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-19: lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyi gzugs mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-21: yang phrad pa las bral na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-22: phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus yongs su blangs nas yang bor te gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-23: 'di la pha ma phrad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-24: dri za nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-25: las la dmigs pa'i dngos po las rnam par shes pas lus 'grub par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-26: las de dag kyang gzugs can ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:160b-27: skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen gyi ngo bo de yang gzugs can ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-2: de bas na 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-3: gzugs kyi 'dod pa len pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-4: de'i phyir yang 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-6: gzhan yang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa de gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-7: 'di la tshul khrims ni srog gcod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-8: ma byin par len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-9: 'dod pa log par g-yem pa dang; brdzun du smra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-11: sbyar ba'i chang myos par byed pa bag med pa'i gnas spong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-13: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-15: de'i len pa ni srid pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-16: lha dang mir skye zhing skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa bskyed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-17: de ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-18: zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i yongs su smin par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-19: phung po rnams kyi sa bon yang rlan par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-20: las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyang sdud par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-21: rnam par shes pa yang sbyor bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-22: nyon mongs pa blangs pa rnams kyang sreg par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-23: de bas na 'di ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-24: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-25: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161a-27: rnam par shes pa 'dis ji ltar lha'i nang du lus yongs su len pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-0: sems can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar len pa @161b lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-4: 'di la rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-6: de'i lta ba de yang sha'i mig la brten pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-7: de'i lta bas mthong ba gang yin de ni len pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-8: de bas na lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-9: de'i lha'i lta ba bsod nams la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-10: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i gnas mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-11: der lha rnams lha'i rtse bdag gis rtse ba mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-15: des der chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i srid pa rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-16: dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de yang des mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-17: 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-18: 'di la bdag lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len pa'i bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags so snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-19: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-20: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-22: rnam par shes pa khog pa de la chags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-24: khog pa de nyid ci'i slad du mi brten /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-30: skra dang kha spu de mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:161b-31: mi de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-2: 'di dag ni phyir yang mgo la bskyed par bya'o snyam na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-5: ci skra de dag phyir skye bar 'gyur ram /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-10: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis khog pa bor nas phyir yang khog pa de nyid la gnas pa 'di ni gnas med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-11: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-12: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-13: rnam par shes pa'i khams cha phra zhing mi mngon pa 'dis glang po che'i lus bong chen po ji ltar bsgrub par bgyid cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-14: rdo rje ltar sra ba'i khog pa yang ji ltar rtol bar bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-15: glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa'i mi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-16: glang po che'i rgyal po yang ji ltar 'dzin par bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-20: rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i ri phrag na gnas pa de yang ri phrag de nas byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-21: ri rab dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa'i ri'i rtse mo snyil bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-22: 'gyes par byed na sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-23: rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-24: ri de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-26: rlung gi khams ni snyi zhing lus ma mchis par lta bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-0: @162b ji ltar rlung gi khams snyi zhing lus med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang zhan cing lus med mod kyi lus chen po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-1: chung ngu dag skyed par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-2: sbrang bu'i yang rnam par shes pa de nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-3: glang po che'i yang de nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-5: mar me'i me lce chung yang ra ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-6: khang pa'i nang gi mun pa chen po sel bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus len pa'i rgyu des na gzugs chung ngu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-7: chen po rnams 'grub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-8: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-9: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-12: de gzugs can zhig lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-13: 'on te gzugs ma mchis pa zhig lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-14: rang bzhin ni ji lta bu lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-15: rkyen ni ji lta bu dag las blta bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-18: 'di la las rnams kyi spyod yul ni lha'i bde ba dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-20: lha'i kha zas thob pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-22: mi dbul po gnyis shig 'brog tu 'khyam pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-23: der gcig gis ni chu bsil ba rnyed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-24: gcig ni skom ste shi na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-25: chu de la la zhig gis snyim pas bcus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-26: mi de la byin pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-27: la la zhig gis mi cig shos de la bkag pa yang med kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-28: bsod nams kyi mthu 'ba' zhig gis gcig gis ni chu rnyed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-29: gcig gis ni ma rnyed pa de bzhin du dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:162b-30: mi dge ba'i chos de dag la blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-2: mar gyi ngo ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-3: mi dge ba yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-5: shing tog rlon pa yongs su smin pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-7: kha dog de dag dang yongs su smin pa yang me'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-8: de bzhin du lus 'di yang bsod nams kyi dbang gis tshong dpon gyi khyim nor dang gser dang dngul dag tu rgyan nye bar ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-9: lha'i gnas dag tu lha'i rgyan dag nye bar ston te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-10: dbang phyug gi rgyan gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi dper bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-12: sa bon sa la btab na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-13: shing gi rtse mor snang ba 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-14: sa bon de yang sdong bu nas sdong bu'i rtse mor 'pho ba med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-15: shing gi nang na yang sa bon de mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-16: mi la la zhig gis lag pa gnyis kyis sa bon de blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-17: shing gi rtse mor bzhag par yang med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-18: sa bon rtsa ba nas 'pho ba yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du las dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-19: mi dge ba lus la gnas pa rnams kyang lus la mi snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-21: sa bon las me tog 'grub pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-22: sa bon gyi nang na yang me tog mi snang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-23: me tog gi nang na yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-24: sa bon dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer med pa de bzhin du lus las kyang las 'byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-25: las las kyang lus 'byung mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-26: lus kyi nang na las mi snang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163a-27: las kyi nang na yang lus mi snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-1: me tog yongs su smin pa na 'bras bu dmigs pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-2: lus smin na las rnams dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-4: gang na sa bon gnas pa der me tog 'byung bar snang ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-5: lus 'di gang dang gang du skyes par gyur pa de dang der las dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-6: mi dge ba 'byung bar snang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-7: las de yang gzugs can ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-8: rnam par smin pa yang gzugs can ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-9: dper na; mi'i lus las grib ma mi gsal zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-10: gzugs can ma yin pa 'byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-11: mi de nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-12: grib ma de yang mi de'i lus dang 'brel pa ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-13: lus med par yang grib ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-16: lus gang dang gang du 'pho ba de dang der las rnams 'brang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-17: lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-18: lus med na yang las rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-22: bska ba la sogs pa'i bye brag gis lus la bkru sman btang na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-23: nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-24: lha'i mdog rgyas pa yang lus la snang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-25: ji ltar sman tsha ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-26: kha ba rnams kyis lus kyi mdog gzhon shar 'dug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-27: yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing 'di snyam du mi 'dis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-28: sman zos gor ma chag go snyam du shes par 'gyur mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-29: sman de dag gi ro dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:163b-30: smin pa de yang gzugs can ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-1: can ma yin pa yang mi'i mdog rgyas pa las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-2: dge ba'i las 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-7: gos kyi bye brag gi dbang gis rkang lag mnyam zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-8: mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-11: dngul 'byor par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-12: rigs dang longs spyod rgyas shing 'byor pa las nyams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-13: nye bar spyad pa dang bral zhing gzhan la re ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-14: kha zas ngan pa za zhing mal stan ngan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-15: gzugs ngan cing mi sdug pa'i lus can gang yin pa de dag ni mi dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-17: me long gi dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sdug pa'am mi sdug pa snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-18: me long gi gzugs brnyan de yang gzugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du dge ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-19: mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa 'di lha rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-23: yi dvags kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-25: las rnams ni de ltar blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-26: de ltar na las 'di dag ni rnam par shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-29: rnam par shes pa 'dis dbang po rnams ji ltar 'bebs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164a-30: lus chen po yang ji ltar yongs su 'dzin par bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-0: bcom ldan 'das @164b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-4: rngon pa nags thibs po'i nang du song nas gzhu shin tu bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-5: dug mdas spos kyi glang po che bong tshod che ba la bsnun la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-6: dug de yang khrag dang phrad na yan lag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-7: nying lag rnams su 'pho zhing 'gro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-8: dbang po'i spyod yul thams cad 'dor la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-9: gnad rnams su bsnun cing khrag gis kha dog bsgyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-11: nying lag thams cad du 'pho zhing 'gro la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-13: dug de lus phyir byung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-16: dug de dang glang po che'i khog pa de'i tshod ji tsam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-21: dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su spong zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dor la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-22: khams rnams kyang yongs su gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-23: de ltar na rnam par shes pa 'di dbang po rnams 'dor bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-25: gzhan yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'di ji ltar lus chen po yongs su 'dzin par bgyid ces zer ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-26: ji ltar kho lag che zhing rags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-28: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la; de yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-29: nye dga' gnyis kyis sum khris su yongs su dkris te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:164b-30: klu'i rgyal po de gnyis kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu bas rgya mtsho btung bar mi rung bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-0: @165a *// de gnyis kyi dbugs kyis ri rab kyang g-yo bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-1: de gnyis ji ltar dug che la spro ba che zhing yangs pa bzhin du nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-5: de dag gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-6: sbrang bu'i yang gzhan no snyam na de ltar lta bar mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-8: 'di ltar rnam par shes pa de nyid sbrang bu'i yang yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-9: de nyid de dag gi yang yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-11: dug bad sa na bha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-12: ha la ha la'i thigs pa chung ngu yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-13: nye dga' la sogs pa de dag gis zos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-18: nye dga' la sogs pa'i dug gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-20: ha la ha la'i dug gi thigs pa gang yin pa de'i nang na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-25: nye dga' gnyis kyi dug ches mang bar lta bar bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-27: ha la ha la'i dug ni de lta ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-30: de bzhin du lus chen po glang po che dgu stong gi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chung zhing mi gsal la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165a-31: gzugs can ma yin pa blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-0: rnam par shes pa de yang las kyi rkyen gyis lus chen po mngon par 'grub par @165b byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-2: shing n+ya gro da'i sa bon chung ngu las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-3: shing gi rgyal po mtho zhing rgya che la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-5: yal ga phre'u brgyad stong gis rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-8: sa bon de'i tshad ni ji tsam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-9: shing de'i tshad ni ji tsam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-17: de bzhin du sa bon de'i nang na yang shing mi snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-18: sa bon med na yang shing skye ba mi dmigs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-19: ji ltar sa bon phra mo las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa cha phra ba las gzugs chen po 'grub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-20: lus la yang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-21: rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye ba mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-22: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-23: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-25: rdo rje'i snying po lta bu'i rnam par shes pa des lus nyam chung ba rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-29: mi dbul po la la zhig gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed nas des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de blangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:165b-37: 'khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-5: de dag thams cad ni mi brtan zhing nyam chung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-8: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de mi de'i lag nas stor na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-9: de'i bde ba'i longs spyod de dag kyang med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-10: ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de rdo rje stong gis kyang mi phyed la de'i yo byad de dag 'jig pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rdo rje'i snying po'i rang bzhin lta bu yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-11: lus gang yin pa de ni snying po med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-14: rnam par shes pa'i khams zhan pa de ji ltar gzugs mkhrang zhing sra ba phye ste 'pho zhing mchi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; sman chen /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-17: chu'i rgyun shin tu 'jam po ri'i gseb na 'dug pas ri de nyid brtol te 'byung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-20: de'i nang na ches sra ba gang yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-22: ri ni rang bzhin gyis mkhrang la rdo rje ltar brtan zhing sra pa lags la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-23: chab ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing reg na bde ba lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166a-25: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis zhan pas lus chen po dag phye ste 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-0: ji ltar sems can gyi ris na sems @166b can shi 'phos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-1: lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba len pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-2: ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-7: bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed kyis yongs su zin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-8: lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa des mi'i lta ba yongs su spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-9: lha'i lta ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-10: de lha'i lta ba des 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-11: sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-12: lus de yang 'dor bar mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-13: lha rdzas kyi lha'i gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-16: me tog gi rna rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-21: lha'i bu mo rtse bas bskor ba yang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-22: rtag tu me tog rgyas shing rnam par bkra bar byas pa'i lha'i longs spyod sdug gus mdzes par byas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-26: dpung rgyan spa zhing spras pas brgyan pa de dag kyang des mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-28: lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug cing yid rab tu dga' ba yang des mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-29: de dag mthong nas kun du chags pa bskyed do; ;de der kun tu chags pas dga' ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-30: dga' ba thob pas yid rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:166b-31: de snying dga' bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-1: bzhin gyi mdog padma lta bur snang bar 'gyur zhing lta ba phyin ci ma log par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-3: de kha yang gnam par mi 'gyur ro; ;de bzhin du de'i mig autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-4: de'i gnad rnams kyang chad par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-5: de'i khrag kyang zag par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-7: de spu zing zhes byed par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-8: de'i sen mo rnams kyang nag por mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-9: lag pa yang ser por snang bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-10: rkang lag kyang g-yos par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-11: rkang lag 'khums bzhin du 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-13: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-14: 'di ltar khang pa brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong gis brgyan pa mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-15: lha'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba sgra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-16: lha'i me tog sna tshogs spel ba'i phreng ba shin tu zhim pa dag mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-21: dpung rgyan gyis mdzes par byas shing lus brgyan pa dag kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-22: des lha'i gzhon nu dag mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-23: de yid dga' bas khog pa la ltas gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-24: so me tog kun da dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167a-25: ku mu da ltar dkar bar snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-2: sgra snyan pa dag kyang 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-3: de'i bzhin yang padma lta bur snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-4: shi ba'i khog pa yang ha cang tsha bar yang mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-5: ha cang grang bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-6: de'i gnyen sdug pa rnams kyang smre sngags chen po 'don par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-7: de nyi ma 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-8: phyogs kyang mun par snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-9: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe phyogs shin tu dri zhim zhing shin tu yongs su dag pa tshor bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-10: de'i mig kyang ser bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-11: de'i lta ba yang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dad pa skye bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-13: gnyen sdug pa dag mthong na ga zhig nas phyir 'ongs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-14: ring mo zhig tu gud na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin du mgul nas 'khyud cing yid rab tu dga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-15: 'di skad du srid par skyes pa thams cad kyi tshul ni 'di yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-16: da nga dang bral ba'i phyir gdung ba ma byed par thong zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-17: ces des gnyen de dag yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-19: gal te sems can bsod nams su nye bar 'gro bas 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sbyin pa la sred cing yud tsam re re la tshigs bcad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:167b-22: gtan tshigs sna tshogs brjod cing smra la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-0: de'i tshe gnyid la yang sred par mi 'gyur zhing gnyid kyi dbang du yang mi @168a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-2: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-3: de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha dang lha mo lhan cig tu khri gcig gi steng na 'dug la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-4: lha mo khri'i steng na 'dug pa de'i lag pa lha'i lag pa'i steng du bzhag cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-5: de'i lag pa gnyis las me tog dag byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-6: lha mo des me tog byung ba dag mthong nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-7: lha de la 'di skad du; lha gzhon nu skye ba'i dga' ba'i dus la bab kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-10: des kyang me tog rnams lag pas mnye zhing phur bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-11: des me tog de dag mnyes pas sems can de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-12: de'i rnam par shes pa des kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-13: dbang po rnams bor zhing dbang po'i spyod yul rnams btang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-14: khams rnams yongs su btang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-15: khams kyi don yongs su blangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-16: mi gsal zhing gzugs can ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-17: rta zhon pa lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-21: chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-22: sbubs kyi nang gi rlung ltar dge ba la dmigs pa bsdus nas byung ste 'pho zhing 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-23: de yang de'i che me tog la brten nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-24: pha ma khri gcig la 'dug cing phrad pas rnam par shes pa me tog de dag gi nang du 'dres par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168a-25: yang der bdud rtsi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i rlung ldang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-0: rlung des rnam par shes pa de zhag bdun @168b lon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-1: lha gzhon nu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med cing 'gul ba dang ldan pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-2: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-3: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-5: rnam par shes pa gzugs can ma lags pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams ji ltar mngon par 'grub par bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-6: rkyen rnams la yang ji ltar gda' bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-10: rlung gi khams gzugs med cing bstan du med pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis lha'i gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-11: ri dang nags tshal la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'grub par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'di yang rkyen gyi dbang gis gzugs rnams 'grub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-13: gzhan yang shing 'dzings pa gnyis phan tshun phrad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-14: gcig la gcig drud cing gtsubs pa las me 'grub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-15: me de yang shing gi nang na mi snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-16: shing med na yang me 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-17: me de yang rkyen gyi dbang gis shing las 'grub par 'gyur gyi rkyen med par mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-18: gzugs kyi dbang gis kyang shing gi nang na me mi snang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-19: shing ma gtogs pa yang me mi dmigs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-21: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa de yang pha ma'i dbang gis 'jug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:168b-22: rnam par shes pa yang lus kyi nang na mi dmigs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-4: me ma byung bar gzugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-6: kha dog gsal bar mi snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-8: de bzhin du lus ma grub par rnam par shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bar snang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-15: gzi brjid kyis lam mer 'dug kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis nyi ma'i gzugs gnag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-18: dmar ser du mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-20: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni lta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-24: reg pa'i rnam pa dag gis rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-25: lus la rnam par shes pa gnag pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-27: gzugs su snang bar mi sa mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-32: phyir yang 'char ba dag gi rtags las snang ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rtags dag gis blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-33: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-35: rnam par shes pa'i rtags ji ltar blta bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-0: yid @169b mi bde ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rtags su blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-1: gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i bag chags 'di ltar dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-2: mi dge bar nye bar 'gro ba'i sems las blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-4: bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-6: ji ltar rnam par shes pa lus las byung ste myur du skye ba yongs su len pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-7: rnam par shes pa lus las byung nas ma skyes shing yongs su ma bzung ba des ji ltar lus gzhan la gnas par bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-8: rnam par shes pa 'di ni ji ltar blta bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-12: mi la la lag pa ring zhing thur du brkyang la g-yul gyi go cha gyon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-13: lha'i rta rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar mgyogs pa la zhon nas g-yul du 'gro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-14: de g-yul ngo der song nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-17: mda' dag gis snying myos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-18: g-yul ngor rta'i mchog de las sa la lhung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-19: de yang lus kyis 'phong rtsal yongs su sbyangs pa zhig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-20: myur ba myur bar sa las rta'i rgyab tu 'gong par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-21: ji ltar mi de lhung nas rta zhon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-22: 'gong che bas ji ltar rta nye bar gnas pa la rta la 'gong ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:169b-23: rta 'gro bzhin du 'gong pa chen pos 'gong bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la yang blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-0: ji ltar mi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs shing skrag @170a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-1: nas rta zhon te 'bros pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'dis thog ma shi 'phos nas lha'i dmigs pas yongs su zin cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-2: lha dang lha mo khri steng na 'dug pa mthong nas shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-4: gzhan yang dang po shi 'phos nas da dung ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar blta bar bya zhes gang khyod kyis smras pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-6: mi'i grib ma chu'i steng du bab pa gzugs su yang snang mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-7: de gzugs su gtogs par yang blta bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-10: rkang lag mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i gzugs chu'i steng du bab pa de la ni dro ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-12: lus ngal bar 'gyur ba med cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-13: lus de la ni sha'i dum bu yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-14: grib ma de la ni khams kyis blangs pa yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-15: mi'i gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du 'byung ba de las ni sdug bsngal ba'i sgra 'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-16: bde ba'i sgra 'byung ba yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-17: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas lus kyi khog pa bor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-18: gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-20: de ltar na rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ni lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba yongs su len par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170a-21: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-0: rnam par shes pa sems @170b can dmyal ba rnams su ji ltar skye ba yongs su len pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-3: bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can ji ltar sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa de nyon cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-5: 'di la sems can las mi dge bas yongs su zin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-6: sems can gyi ris nas 'chi 'pho ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-7: shi 'phos pa de 'di snyam du mi de ni nga nyid yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-8: sems can dmyal ba 'di nas shi 'phos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-9: 'di gnyis ni bdag gi pha ma yin no snyam du dran pa skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-10: shi 'phos pa de'i lus de ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-11: yan lag skyes rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-12: dang po shi 'phos pa de mya ngan gyis g-yengs nas sems can dmyal ba sna tshogs snang ba mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-13: rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos pa de'i las sems can dmyal ba dang 'brel par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-14: phyogs kha gcig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sa gzhi khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas de der chags pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-15: de chags par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus 'grub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:170b-16: de'i rnam par shes pa des las kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis chu'i rjen shul shin tu rul cing mchog tu dri mi zhim pa mnam pa'i nang du lus skye ba yongs su len te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-0: ljan ljin mnam po'i rkyen gyis srin bu @171a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-5: chang mnam por gyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-7: de bzhin du sems can rnams /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-8: sems can dmyal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-9: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bzang skyong gis thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-10: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-12: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi kha dog gi rnam pa ji lta bu lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-13: lus kyi rnam pa ni ji lta bur 'grub par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-16: der khrag gi nang na skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-17: chu klung rgal du med pa dag gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sprin sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-18: ba tshva can gyi chu klung gi nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag ni sha gzi gur 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-19: de dag gi lus ni rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu bde dgur rim gro byas pa ltar gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-21: de na de dag lus bong che bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-22: mgo bo ma gtogs par khru brgyad par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-23: sen mo ring zhing kha spu yod la spun por 'gyur zhing rkang lag mi sdug par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171a-24: gal te 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba pa'i mi la ltar 'gro na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-0: mthong ma thag tu @171b 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-2: gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kha zas za mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-3: de dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-6: sems can de dag kha zas ci 'tshal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-9: sems can dmyal ba de na de dag yongs su 'khyam la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-10: shin tu rgyang ring ba nas zangs dang ra gan dmar por snang ba mthong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-11: de dag mthong nas kha zas kyi tshig rjod par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-12: kha zas 'dod pa khyed tshur shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-15: snyim pa bzed nas zangs dang ra gan bskol ba ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas; snyim pa bzed cing zangs dang ra gan bskol ba'i kha zas de dag 'dod pas kha gdangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-16: zangs dang ra gan za bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-17: de dag zangs dang ra gan rab tu 'bar ba des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-18: su ru rur rab tu 'bar zhing khog pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-20: de dag kha zas 'dra bas bslus nas sdug bsngal shin tu che ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-22: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag gi rnam par shes pa de rus pa'i lus dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:171b-23: rus pa'i tshogs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-0: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag rnam @172a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-1: par shes pa dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-2: de dag bru ba tsha bas gzir bzhin du de na kha zas kyi bya ba yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-3: de na lha'i skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa brgya phrag mang po me tog shin tu rgyas pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-4: gsing ma sngon po yangs pa'i sa phyogs dag kyang yod par mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-5: de dag gis skyed mos tshal de dag mthong nas yid rab tu dga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-7: skyed mos tshal 'di na reg na bde ba'i ser bu ldang ba yod kyi tshur shog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-8: ces zer te de dag 'dus nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-9: myur ba myur bar skyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-10: de dag de'i nang du song nas yud tsam zhig bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-11: de dag gi shing de dag las byung ba'i me tog de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-12: lo ma de dag ral grir 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-13: ral gri de dag gis yan lag gcod cing gshegs par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-14: de dag ral gris bcad nas nyams thag pa'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed cing phyogs phyogs su 'byer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-15: de dag 'byer ba na yang rang gi las las byung ba'i gshin rje'i mi'i lag na sog le dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-16: tho ba thogs shing so dang bzhin bsgyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-17: skra 'bar zhing lus 'bar ba'i phreng bas g-yogs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-18: mtshon cha gzas pa dag phyi bzhin du sgra 'byin cing 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172a-19: khyed cag sdod cig da gar 'bros /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-0: khyed rang gi las kyis @172b bsgrubs pa'i tshal 'di nyams su myong bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-3: de ltar na sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams skyo ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-5: gzhan yang zhag bdun lon nas sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyis las nyams su myong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-6: bung ba me tog la 'pho ba bzhin du dngos po sna tshogs kyi rkyen gyi dbang gis rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-7: de yang dang po shi 'phos nas dbang med par khrid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-8: sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur nas mun pa mun nag chen por zhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-9: mi rgod kyis khrid pa bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-11: da ni bdag 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bkra pa bor te gnyen sdug pa yongs su spangs nas; sems can dmyal ba dag tu mngon du gnas par gyur cing 'dug ci gu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-12: da ni mtho ris kyi lam mi mthong ngo snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-13: der yang dar gyi srin bu rgyud gcig gis dkris pa bzhin du shin tu myur bar skye ba yongs su len te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-14: de yang bdag nyid kyi mgul nas zhags pas btags par shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-16: de ltar na sems can dmyal bar sems can rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-17: de ltar na de dag la rgyu'i bye brag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-18: de nas bzang skyong spu zing zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:172b-19: bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-1: bu gzhon nu sman chen gyis kyang 'di skad du dam pa'i chos mnyan ba 'dis na bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe log par ltung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-2: bdag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len par ma gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bzang skyong gis 'di skad gsol to; ;yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag zhu ba zhu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-6: bzang skyong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-11: phung po rnams ni gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-16: khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-23: rnam par shes pa rnams ni bsags pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-24: de la sbungs pa ni khams drug po nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-25: skye mched kyi spyod yul drug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-26: khams kyi rang bzhin gsum dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173a-27: skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-3: nying lag tshogs la spungs zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-9: mon sran sde'u mang po la spungs pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du lus kyi yan lag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-10: nying lag tu gtogs pa tshogs pa la spungs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-11: khams drug po de dag gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-17: rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-18: skye mched drug gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-25: skye mched kyi spyod yul drug gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-31: chos kyi skye mched ces bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-32: de dag ni spyod yul drug yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-33: de la khams kyi rang bzhin gsum gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-37: de la de dag nyid kyi kun nas ldang ba gsum gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-39: mkhris pa dang; bad kan rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-40: de la skye mched len pa'i rgyu gnyis gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-49: de la phung po zhes bya ba'i don gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:173b-53: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-1: gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-2: de la tshor ba ni myong ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-4: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'du byed rnams so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-5: blta ba dang; nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-8: reg bya rnams rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-9: dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pas na lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-10: len pa dang mthun pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-11: de la 'pho ba zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-12: lus dang ngag gi las kyi 'bras bu thob pa'i 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa des phung po rnams yongs su btang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-13: yang srid par mi skye zhing phyir mi ldog pas na shin tu bde bar 'pho zhing 'gro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-14: 'phos pa de'i phyir yang 'pho ba can ma yin pa de lta bu ni de'i 'pho bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-16: sman chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-17: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-18: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pas sems can rnams tshim par bgyid pa gang lags pa'i chos kyi tshogs 'di legs par gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos pa ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174a-22: 'di'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas rig pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-0: shes rab kyi snang ba @174b 'di ni dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong du mas bsgrubs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-1: 'di ni ngas ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-2: chos kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-3: yon tan gyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho'i mdzod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-5: sems can rnams kyi rgyud 'dul bar byed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-6: 'dul ba ston pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-7: de ston par 'gyur ba der ni mi ma yin pa rnams srung bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-10: lto 'phye chen po rnams phyag bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-14: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-15: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de la ni mtshon gyi 'jigs pa byung bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-16: dug gi 'jigs pa byung bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-20: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-22: khyed kyis deng phan chad ma dad pa rnams la bshad par mi bya'o; ;klan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-23: gcer bu pa rnams la ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-24: gcer bu pa'i nyan thos rnams la ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-25: gnas gzhan la zhugs pa la bshad par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-26: ma dris par yang bshad par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-27: de bas na gal te la 'khrul par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:174b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa la la 'khrul pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-0: khyim na gnas pa gang la las 'di @175a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-1: rtogs pa de ni phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du gus pa bskyed par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-3: 'di ni mdzod 'dzin pa yin no; ;snyam du bzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-6: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-10: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-13: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar 'tshal na; bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-14: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-18: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par shes pa 'pho ba zhes bya bar gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-19: bzang skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-20: brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-21: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-22: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-24: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-26: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175a-29: rgyal bu gzhon nu sman chen dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-5: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-7: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs ba chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-8: tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-9: sum cu rtsa dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-10: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-040-004:175b-12: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
